name: Maze of Hearts
description:
Photosensitive warning, this game contains many flashing lights and colors.

You are half of a whole, looking for the other half.

Created for Brackeys Gamejam 2 - Feb 2019

Timeline: 1 Week

Total Hours Work: Approx. 15 hours

Special thanks to my classmates for excellent feedback.

Special thanks to Mark S for the perfect music.

***Update 02/23/2019*** 

    - Added a download to the build directly instead of navigating the sourcecode.
